sentences.en: He upended the beer, and swallowed.
sentences.cn: 他把啤酒倒出来，大口喝了。

sentences.en: If successful, we will upend our main competitors.
sentences.cn: 如果成功, 我们将击败我们的主要竞争对手.

sentences.en: We'll have to upend the cupboard to get it through the door.
sentences.cn: 我们得把碗橱倒过来才能抬过这门.

sentences.en: We'll have to upend the sofa to get it through the door.
sentences.cn: 我们得把沙发倒过来才能抬过这门.

trans.tran_en: to turn something over so that it is upside down
